name: Sacred Flame
description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from Half Cover or Three-Quarters Cover for this save.
higherLevelsDescription: The damage increases by 1d8 when you reach levels 5 (2d8), 11 (3d8), and 17 (4d8).

effects.special: Target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

engineHook.notes: Requires save-for-damage mechanic and logic to bypass cover bonuses to Dexterity saves.
